lines.content: This is a project template for a greenfield Java project. It's named after the Java mascot _Duke_. Given below are instructions on how to use it.
Prerequisites: JDK 11, update Intellij to the most recent version.
1. Open Intellij (if you are not in the welcome screen, click `File` > `Close Project` to close the existing project first)
1. Open the project into Intellij as follows:
1. Select the project directory, and click `OK`.
1. If there are any further prompts, accept the defaults.
1. Configure the project to use **JDK 11** (not other versions) as explained in [here](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/idea/sdk.html#set-up-jdk).
In the same dialog, set the **Project language level** field to the `SDK default` option.

3. After that, locate the `src/main/java/duke.Duke.java` file, right-click it, and choose `Run duke.Duke.main()` (if the code editor is showing compile errors, try restarting the IDE). If the setup is correct, you should see something like the below as the output:
public void processCommand(String command, Ui ui, TaskList taskList, Storage storage) throws DukeException {
public void addTask(String task, Ui ui, TaskList taskList) throws DukeException {
if (task.length() < 6) throw new DukeException("☹ OOPS!!! The description of a todo cannot be empty.");
if (task.length() < 10) throw new DukeException("☹ OOPS!!! The description of a deadline cannot be empty.");
if (task.length() < 7) throw new DukeException("☹ OOPS!!! The description of an event cannot be empty.");
Event event = new Event(description, from, to);
throw new DukeException("☹ OOPS!!! I'm sorry, but I don't know what that means :-(");
public void writeFile(TaskList taskList) throws IOException {
public void readFile(TaskList taskList) throws FileNotFoundException {
Event event = new Event(description, from, to);
public Event(String description, String from, String to) {
System.out.println("    Here are the tasks in your list:");
System.out.println("    Hello! I'm Thinh's chatbot\n    What can I do for you?");
System.out.println("    Bye. Hope to see you again soon!");
public void addTask(Task task, int newSize) {
System.out.println("    Got it. I've added this task:");
System.out.println("    Now you have " + newSize + " tasks in the list.");
public void deleteTask(Task task, int newSize) {
System.out.println("    Noted. I've removed this task:");
System.out.println("    Now you have " + newSize + " tasks in the list.");
System.out.println("    Nice! I've marked this task as done:");
System.out.println("    OK, I've marked this task as not done yet:");
Deadline deadline = new Deadline("finish individual project", "2023-09-09");
Todo todo = new Todo("do individual project");
